insert.selectKey: select count(1) from dr_channel_keywords where code = #{code} and keyword = #{keyword} and kCode=#{kCode}

mapper.select: select k.*,u.name from dr_channel_keywords k left join sys_users u on k.addUserKey = u.user_ky where 1=1 and k.code = #{code} and k.keyword like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') order by k.addTime desc limit #{offset},#{limit}
select count(k.id) from dr_channel_keywords k where 1=1 and k.code = #{code} and k.keyword like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
mapper.update: update dr_channel_keywords set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select c.`name`,c.`code`,cpa.activityName,cpa.activityCode,k.keyword,k.kCode,ifnull(CONCAT(cpa.url,'-',k.kCode),cpa.url) as url from dr_cpa_info cpa left join dr_channel_info c ON cpa.cid = c.id left JOIN dr_channel_keywords k ON c.id = k.cid and k.status=1 where cpa.id=#{id}
